Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie (Homan)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie (Homan) due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie (Homan) due to debris on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#52 Kedzie/California

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service from Forest Park - UIC/Halsted in both directions

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
